description:
At prAna, nature is the guiding force behind our creations, which is why we dedicated this short sleeve tee for men to our favorite stream, Bishops Creek, located at the foothills of the Sierra Mountains.

It's also why we work hard to make sure our graphic tees are created in harmony with our planet, our people, and you. So enjoy the Earth-friendly fabric, the good feels, and the inspiration to get outside!
name: Prana Bishop Creek SS Tee - Mens
